li.label: psychically hypersensitive
li.description: NAME's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. HECAP is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.

li.label: psychically sensitive
li.description: NAME's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.

li.label: psychically dull
li.description: NAME's mind is psychically out of tune with others. HECAP isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.

li.label: psychically deaf
li.description: NAME's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. HECAP just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
